channel.title: Posts on vNoted
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on vNoted

item.title: Convert Your eBooks to Audiobooks: A Guide to Using ebook2audiobook with AI Voice Cloning
item.description: A guide on Exploring ebook2audiobook: Convert ebooks to audiobooks with chapters and metadata using dynamic AI models and voice cloning. Supports 1,107+ languages!

item.title: Exploring LocalAI: The Open Source, Self-Hosted Alternative to OpenAI
item.description: A guide on Exploring LocalAI: :robot: The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more models architectures. Features: Generate Text, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P inference

item.title: How to Build Your Own Home Media Server: A Step-by-Step Guide

item.description: A guide on Migrating from Windows to Linux

item.description: A guide on Linux server monitoring tools
